pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Reusable Silicone Face Mask
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Ultra-thin silicone mask with advanced 3D technology for the perfect fit. Adheres to the contours of the face locking in moisture and enhancing serum absorption. Use over Skin Republic serums or face masks to boost results.

Common Uses

Reusable silicone face mask to be used over Skin Republic serums or face masks for enhanced skin care benefits.
Locks in serums for maximum skin nourishment.
Prevents evaporation and traps heat helping serums penetrate deeper into the skin.
 This silicone mask is reusable and recyclable.

Directions

DIRECTIONS
1. Apply a few drops of a Skin Republic serum to the face or apply a Skin Republic Face Mask Sheet.
2. Secure mask onto the face by placing ear loops over ears.
3. If the ear loops are too tight, cut along the lines at the top and bottom of the ear loop to loosen.
4. Wear for 15 - 20 minutes.
5. Remove mask. Do not rinse serum off the face.
6. Wash mask using a gentle cleanser and warm water. Allow to dry before storing.
7. Can also be used over a Skin Republic sheet mask to enhance absorption.
8. Store in a cool, dry place and keep out of direct sunlight.
